page.title: 11A TYPICAL DAY IN MY LIFE...
page.content: {A TYPICAL DAY IN MY LIFE} When I get up every morning firstly I get dressed and then I go and help Mum with the breakfast. Mum does my hair because it is long and hard for me to do my self. Then I brush my teeth and get my packed lunch ready and get shoes on and go to school. The first thing I do when the bell rings is go inside (unless I am already in) and then normally I do sums until break time. Afterwards I usually do English language work. In the afternoon our class normally does drawing,painting and puppets and other craft activities Some times we go out for environmental studies. After school I go home and get into trousers. Then I go to play on the bales. Round about six o'clock I come down and have my tea.
